sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export const TodoForm = ({addTodo}) => { const [value, setValue] = useState({ task: "", line: "", error: "", severity: "", priority: "", status: "", compo: "", assignee: "" }) const [isValid, setIsValid] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const { task, line, compo, error, priority, severity, status, assignee } = value if(task !=="" && line !=="" && compo !=="" && error !=="" && priority !=="" && severity !=="" && status !=="" && assignee !==""){ setIsValid(true) } console.log(value) console.log(isValid) }, [value, isValid]) const handleClick = e =>{ const { task, line, compo, error, priority, severity, status, assignee } = value let message value.map(values => { if(values.target.value === "") { return message = values.target.name } }) if(!isValid) alert(` Please fill ${message} field to submit the issue`) } const handleChange = e =>{ const { name, value } = e.target setValue((prevVal) => ({ ...prevVal, [name]: value })) console.log({[name]:value}) } const handleSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() const { task, line, compo, error, priority, severity, status, assignee } = value if(task && line && compo && error && priority && severity && status && assignee){ addTodo(task, line, compo, error, priority, severity, status, assignee) setValue({ task: "", line: "", error: "", severity: "", priority: "", status: "", compo: "", assignee: "", }) setIsValid(()=>false) }else{ handleClick() return } } return (


) }
